item.title: About Me
item.description: Myself “Shiras Hassan”, a full stack developer and Domain-Driven-Design Enthusiast. Its been a while i was thinking to write a blog. Today i am happy to open one tech blog. I hope this will help me to connect with more members and share my thoughts on various subjects. And ultimately i want to document all my learnings. Have questions or suggestions? Feel free to ask. Thanks for reading!
